body:
The answer appears to be on stack overflow.

```py
config = tf.ConfigProto()
config.gpu_options.allow_growth = True
session = tf.Session(config=config, ...)
```

If there's a bug in TensorFlow that we can fix here, please help us learn more and I'll reopen this issue.
